metadata.vision: A fully immersive, text-based MUD featuring a rich color system, autonomous NPC agents, and the first major content expansion 'Shadowfen'.

epics.title: The Slums of Thornhaven
epics.description: A dangerous, poverty-stricken district in the shadow of the city walls.

epics.title: The Merchant District
epics.description: The bustling heart of commerce, contrasting with the Slums.

epics.title: The Sunken Cathedral
epics.description: A mid-level dungeon located in the deep swamp.

epics.title: Immersion & Polish
epics.description: Making the world breathe with sensory details and object histories.

epics.title: Lore & Worldbuilding
epics.description: Establishing the history, magic, and cultures of Aethermoor.

epics.title: Tactical Combat
epics.description: From dice rolls to war stories.

epics.title: Core Systems
epics.description: Foundational systems to support the new content.

tasks.title: Verify Release Pipeline
tasks.description: A dummy task to verify the end-to-end release process.

tasks.title: Design Slums Layout
tasks.description: Create a maze-like layout with dangerous alleys for the Slums district.

tasks.title: Write Slums Descriptions
tasks.description: Write gritty, oppressive atmosphere descriptions for the Slums.

tasks.title: Design 'The Rat King's Tribute' Quest
tasks.description: Create a quest involving the Rat King in the Slums.

tasks.title: Design 'Stolen Medicine' Quest
tasks.description: Create a quest about stolen medicine in the Slums.

tasks.title: Design Merchant District Layout
tasks.description: Create wide streets and shop layouts for the Merchant District.

tasks.title: Write Shop Descriptions
tasks.description: Write luxurious, aromatic, busy descriptions for merchant shops.

tasks.title: Design 'The Counterfeit Coins' Quest
tasks.description: Create a quest about counterfeit coins in the Merchant District.

tasks.title: Design 'Escort the Caravan' Quest
tasks.description: Create a caravan escort quest for the Merchant District.

tasks.title: Design Dungeon Layout
tasks.description: Create flooded halls and hidden chambers for the Sunken Cathedral.

tasks.title: Write Dungeon Descriptions
tasks.description: Write eerie, damp, echoing descriptions for the Sunken Cathedral.

tasks.title: Design Boss Encounter: 'The High Priest of Rot'
tasks.description: Create the final boss encounter for the Sunken Cathedral.

tasks.title: Update Room Descriptions with Sensory Details
tasks.description: Add sight, sound, and smell details to existing room descriptions.

tasks.title: Write Backstories for Key Items
tasks.description: Create histories and lore for important items in the game.

tasks.title: Write Lore Primer: 'The Sundering' & 'The Three Realms'
tasks.description: Establish the foundational lore of the world.

tasks.title: Define Magic System: 'The Singing'
tasks.description: Create the magic system based on Threads and Weaving.

tasks.title: Create Naming Conventions & Cultural Guides
tasks.description: Establish naming patterns and cultural guidelines for consistency.

tasks.title: Retrofit Existing Room Descriptions with Cultural Flavor
tasks.description: Update existing rooms with cultural and lore elements.

tasks.title: Write Combat Flavor Text
tasks.description: Create weapon-specific combat descriptions.

tasks.title: Design Enemy Archetypes
tasks.description: Create enemy types with unique tactics and personalities.

tasks.title: Create 'Help' System Content
tasks.description: Write comprehensive help documentation for players.
